section.title: Release 1.11.94
section.para: Release 1.11.94 is the third release candidate for the OpenNMS 1.12 series. It contains more bugfixes and cleanups.
The codename for 1.11.94 is Dave Grohl

section.title: Release 1.11.93
section.para: Release 1.11.93 is the third release candidate for the OpenNMS 1.12 series. It contains more bugfixes, and makes Provisiond the default for answering node newSuspect events, rather than Capsd. To revert to the old behavior, set org.opennms.provisiond.enableDiscovery=false in opennms.properties.
The codename for 1.11.93 is Alan Doyle

section.title: Release 1.11.92
section.para: Release 1.11.92 is the third release candidate for the OpenNMS 1.12 series. It is identical to 1.11.91 except for a fix for reading eventconf.xml files that don't have an XML namespace attribute.
The codename for 1.11.92 is Steve Vai

section.title: Release 1.11.91
section.para: Release 1.11.91 is the second release candidate for the OpenNMS 1.12 series.
The codename for 1.11.91 is Joe Satriani

section.title: Release 1.11.90
section.para: Release 1.11.90 is the first release candidate for the OpenNMS 1.12 series.
The codename for 1.11.90 is John Roderick

section.title: Release 1.11.3
section.para: Release 1.11.3 is the latest in the unstable series of OpenNMS. It contains what will eventually be a part of the OpenNMS 1.12.x stable releases.
The codename for 1.11.3 is Jonathan Coulton

section.title: Release 1.11.2
section.para: Release 1.11.2 is the latest in the unstable series of OpenNMS. It contains what will eventually be a part of the OpenNMS 1.12.x stable releases.
The codename for 1.11.2 is Damian Hess

section.title: Release 1.11.1
section.para: Release 1.11.1 is the latest in the unstable series of OpenNMS. It contains what will eventually be a part of the OpenNMS 1.12.x stable releases.
The codename for 1.11.1 is Mike Doughty

section.title: Release 1.11.0
section.para: Release 1.11.0 is the first in the latest unstable series of OpenNMS. It contains what will eventually be a part of the OpenNMS 1.12.x stable releases.
The codename for 1.11.0 is MCA

section.title: Release 1.10.12
section.para: Release 1.10.12 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a few bugfixes and enhancements, including a fix for the alarm detail page.
The codename for 1.10.12 is Arghul.

section.title: Release 1.10.11
section.para: Release 1.10.11 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a few bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.11 is Nadaswaram.

section.title: Release 1.10.10
section.para: Release 1.10.10 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a number of bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.10 is Tumpong.

section.title: Release 1.10.9
section.para: Release 1.10.9 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a number of bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.9 is Nose Flute.

section.title: Release 1.10.8
section.para: Release 1.10.8 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a number of bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.8 is Trikiti.

section.title: Release 1.10.7
section.para: Release 1.10.7 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a number of bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.7 is Buccina

section.title: Release 1.10.6
section.para: Release 1.10.6 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a number of bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.6 is Cornamuse.

section.title: Release 1.10.5
section.para: Release 1.10.5 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a few minor bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.5 is Tromboon.

section.title: Release 1.10.4
section.para: Release 1.10.4 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a few minor bugfixes and enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.4 is Archlute.

section.title: Release 1.10.3
section.para: Release 1.10.3 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains a few bugfixes, most notably an important deadlock fix when using provisiond.
The codename for 1.10.3 is Fiscorn.

section.title: Release 1.10.2
section.para: Release 1.10.2 is the latest in the stable series of OpenNMS releases. It contains bugfixes, including a fix for a filehandle leak regression, Windows installer fixes, and some minor enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.2 is Charango.

section.title: Release 1.10.1
section.para: Release 1.10.1 is the second in the latest series of stable releases. It contains plenty of bugfixes, as well as a few minor enhancements.
The codename for 1.10.1 is Hurdy Gurdy.

section.title: Release 1.10.0
section.para: Release 1.10.0 is the first in the latest series of stable releases.
The codename for 1.10.0 is Alboka.

section.title: Release 1.9.93
section.para: Release 1.9.93 is the latest in a series of development releases of OpenNMS. This represents what will eventually become OpenNMS 1.10.0 when it is blessed as the next stable release.
The codename for 1.9.93 is Kora.

Since 1.9.0, a few new features were added.

section.title: Release 1.9.0

Since 1.8, a few new features were added.
The codename for 1.9.0 is Timple.
